message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I think $85 would be a fair price for me.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $92.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget, I think $87.5 would be a fair price for me.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $87.5. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $91.25.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet in the middle. Considering my budget constraints, I think $88.75 would be a fair price for me.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $88.75. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $90.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I think $89.25 would be a fair price for me.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $89.25. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $90.75.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in negotiating. Considering my budget constraints, I think $89.5 would be a fair price for me.
